title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 484.4 - Exemption from fees for medical waste transporters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 484.4 - Exemption from fees for medical waste transporters

State Regulations
(a) Transporters of medical waste that meet
the following requirements are exempt from paying waste transporter fees: (1)
operate as a not-for-profit corporation
as defined in Not- for-Profit Corporation Law, section 102 or a governmental
organization; (2)
generate less
than 100 pounds per month of regulated medical waste; and
(3)
transport only their own waste in
accordance with all provisions of the ECL. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
484.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
